metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7298 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: In Moodle 3.2.2+, there is XSS in the Course summary filter of the "Add a new course" page, as demonstrated by a crafted attribute of an SVG element.

notes.Note: msalvatore> upstream disputes that this is a vulnerability

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'upstream disputed').
